title: Чайная пара
overview: Olga, a talented artist, has been divorced for five years. But her ex-husband, gambling addict Vitek, continues to come to her and borrow money. The head of the workshop in which Olga works decides to take the happiness of her best craftswoman into her own hands. She woos Olga businessman Novikov, the owner of the hotel, to which she decides to take her employees on vacation.
